techmeme.title: Interfax: Apple has removed the mobile apps of 25 VPN services from its App Store in Russia, following a request by Roskomnadzor (Reuters)
Researcher: X is exploring more ways to integrate xAI's Grok, including the ability to ask Grok about X accounts and use Grok by highlighting text in the app (Sarah Perez/TechCrunch)
A test of seven Copilot+ PCs, representing all four Snapdragon X chips, against similar laptops with Apple Silicon, Intel Core Ultra, and AMD Ryzen processors (Joanna Nelius/The Verge)
California court complaint: two ex-executives at Tether-backed Northern Data say they were fired after raising concerns about alleged fraud by the CEO and COO (Bryce Elder/Financial Times)
Sources: to lessen its reliance on Safari for iOS, Google considered limiting AI Overviews to its own mobile apps, but ultimately decided against such a move (Jon Victor/The Information)
